alert.note: Alert for Lowlands of the Bootheel; Uplands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 3:55PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Hidalgo County through 430 PM MDT... At 355 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Windmill, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Animas, Playas and Windmill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lowlands of the Bootheel; Uplands of the Bootheel
